name: Whiplash (itch)
description:
Whiplash Controls

WASD to move

K to jump

L to use grappling hook

Or:

Arrow keys to move

Z to jump

X to use grappling hook

Info

My first Game Jam game and the first game I finish in the last 8 years. So I have no idea if it's super easy or super hard, your feedback is appreciated.

Done in 9 days for the Game Boy Jam 8.

Credits:

Sounds by:
Kenney

Title Screen art:
